boat.construction_details: Strip planked  over iroko laminated ring frames, covered with double diagonal marine ply and epoxied glass mat.
boat.full_description:
Owned from new by Anthony John (Gubby) Williams and Christine Alma (nee Thery) Williams, Minstrel was built to a commissioned design by A J Williams & R Feloy at Totnes.

She cruised to the Carribean 1991-2 then to Maine for three years returning to Southern Ireland in 1995 and was moored at Hare Island, Skibbereen for several years.

Following a refit in 2008 she carries a  Yard topsail, longer in the hoist than the mainsail luff.  She has cruised the western English Channel and circumnavigated Britian via Caledonian Canal, taking part in the OGA Round Britain Challenge in 2013 and again in 2023.
boat.name: Minstrel
boat.short_description: Built at Totnes, Devon, to a commissioned design in 1991, Minstrel has cruised extensively in the Carribean, Maine, Southern Ireland and undertaken three circumnavigations of Britain.
